name: 8bit Games: Flying 3D
description:
Do you know retro computer?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"If you don't crave retro — do not buy this game. But if you do, it's pretty amusing. You've been warned." - Touch Arcade

"The taste in the 70's at hand. 8bit Games - Flying!" - getnews.jp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Do you think can play 3D-Graphics game on a too old PC?


Features:
- Awesome 3D-Graphics! (in the retro PC)
- Realistic Texture-Mapping! (Similarly, in the retro PC)
- Easy control by tilt
- To our regret, it is not support for full color graphics
- Similarly, the sound is not so gorgeous

[ NEW! ]
- Supported color graphics!
- Supported touch control
- Game Center Support
